name: The Alarm (Aphix.Dev, CosmicSnowman)
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night. You get up and see the time is 1:11 PM. You see a note that says to meet someone in 2 minutes. Will you wait for the time to run out? Or will you live...

Created By: Jake (CosmicSnowman) and Jordan (Aphix.Dev) for the 2-minute horror game jam.
